languages.text: Обретя власть и могущество, Джай Хейдари приложила огромные усилия к тому, чтобы изжить культ Кровавой паутины. То, с какой легкостью она натравливала на ткачей всевозможных убийц и сеяла очерняющую пропаганду, выдавало ее глубокую личную заинтересованность. Многие считали подобное поведение безрассудным и ждали ответного удара, но его... не было. Раскладывая раз за разом во тьме Таро Императора, Висирь Кибелла мрачно хмурилась, но не могла отыскать указания оборвать жизнь дерзкой противницы. И клинок оставался в ножнах.

With her newly acquired power and resources, Jae Heydari expended a great deal of effort to put an end to the Cult of the Bloodspun Web. The ease with which she sent assassins after the spinners and spread damning propaganda betrayed her strong vested interest. Many thought her actions reckless and expected a retaliatory strike to be delivered before long, but... it never came. With the cards of the Emperor's Tarot spread before her in the darkness, Vizsier Kibellah performed one reading after another, but, as much as it troubled her, she could find no command to end the life of her brazen adversary. Thus, the blade remained sheathed.
languages.original_text: Обретя власть и могущество, Джай Хейдари приложила огромные усилия к тому, чтобы изжить культ Кровавой паутины. languages.text: Con el poder y los recursos que había amasado, Jae Heydari no escatimó en esfuerzos para poner fin al Culto de la Red Sanguinolenta. Su empeño a la hora de enviar asesinos tras los tejedores y divulgar propaganda incriminatoria evidenciaba un gran interés personal. Muchos opinaron que actuaba de forma imprudente y temieron la inevitable represalia... pero jamás ocurrió. Con las cartas del tarot del Emperador desplegadas frente a ella en la oscuridad, la visir Kibellah realizó una lectura tras otra, pero para su consternación nunca vio en ellas la orden de acabar con la vida de su procaz adversaria. Así pues, su hoja no abandonó su vaina.
languages.original_text: With her newly acquired power and resources, Jae Heydari expended a great deal of effort to put an end to the Cult of the Bloodspun Web. The ease with which she sent assassins after the spinners and spread damning propaganda betrayed her strong vested interest. Many thought her actions reckless and expected a retaliatory strike to be delivered before long, but... it never came. Thus, the blade remained sheathed.

Su empeño a la hora de enviar asesinos tras los tejedores y divulgar propaganda incriminatoria evidenciaba un gran interés personal. Muchos opinaron que actuaba de forma imprudente y temieron la inevitable represalia... pero jamás ocurrió. Con las cartas del tarot del Emperador desplegadas frente a ella en la oscuridad, la visir Kibellah realizó una lectura tras otra, pero para su consternación nunca vio en ellas la orden de acabar con la vida de su procaz adversaria. Así pues, su hoja no abandonó su vaina.

languages.text: 新たに手に入れた権力と資源を背景に、ジェイ・ヘイダリはブラッドスパン・ウェブのカルトに終止符を打つために多大な努力を費やした。紡績業者の後に暗殺者を送り込み、不利なプロパガンダを広めることは、彼女の強い既得権益を裏切るものだった。彼女の行動を無謀だと考える者は多く、間もなく報復攻撃が行われるだろうと期待したが、それは決してやってこなかった。暗闇の中、皇帝陛下の占い札を目の前に広げ、ヴィジール・キベラは次々と占いを行ったが、彼女を悩ませるほど、図々しい敵の命を絶つ命令を見つけることはできなかった。そのため、刃は鞘に収められたままだった。
languages.original_text: With her newly acquired power and resources, Jae Heydari expended a great deal of effort to put an end to the Cult of the Bloodspun Web. The ease with which she sent assassins after the spinners and spread damning propaganda betrayed her strong vested interest. Many thought her actions reckless and expected a retaliatory strike to be delivered before long, but... it never came. With the cards of the Emperor's Tarot spread before her in the darkness, Vizsier Kibellah performed one reading after another, but, as much as it troubled her, she could find no command to end the life of her brazen adversary. Thus, the blade remained sheathed.

traits.locale_text: 新たに手に入れた権力と資源を背景に、ジェイ・ヘイダリはブラッドスパン・ウェブのカルトに終止符を打つために多大な努力を費やした。紡績業者の後に暗殺者を送り込み、不利なプロパガンダを広めることは、彼女の強い既得権益を裏切るものだった。彼女の行動を無謀だと考える者は多く、間もなく報復攻撃が行われるだろうと期待したが、それは決してやってこなかった。暗闇の中、皇帝陛下の占い札を目の前に広げ、ヴィジール・キベラは次々と占いを行ったが、彼女を悩ませるほど、図々しい敵の命を絶つ命令を見つけることはできなかった。そのため、刃は鞘に収められたままだった。

languages.text: 婕伊·海达利凭借新的力量与资源，付出了巨大的努力，试图消灭织血罗网教派。她不遗余力地派遣刺客暗杀织网者，散布各种各样的谣言抹黑教派的声誉。无疑，她的举动掺杂了很多个人感情因素。许多人认为她的做法过于鲁莽，认为织血罗网不久后就会对她进行报复，然而……织血罗网的报复却始终未曾到来。在黑暗之中，宿老绮贝菈将帝皇的塔罗牌摊开，一张又一张地解读着帝皇的预兆，但结果却令她非常烦恼，因为她根本看不到任何暗示，完全没有理由消灭那位厚颜无耻的对手。因此，绮贝菈的利刃始终未曾出鞘。
languages.original_text: With her newly acquired power and resources, Jae Heydari expended a great deal of effort to put an end to the Cult of the Bloodspun Web. The ease with which she sent assassins after the spinners and spread damning propaganda betrayed her strong vested interest. Many thought her actions reckless and expected a retaliatory strike to be delivered before long, but... it never came. With the cards of the Emperor's Tarot spread before her in the darkness, Vizsier Kibellah performed one reading after another, but, as much as it troubled her, she could find no command to end the life of her brazen adversary. Thus, the blade remained sheathed.

traits.locale_text: 婕伊·海达利凭借新的力量与资源，付出了巨大的努力，试图消灭织血罗网教派。她不遗余力地派遣刺客暗杀织网者，散布各种各样的谣言抹黑教派的声誉。无疑，她的举动掺杂了很多个人感情因素。许多人认为她的做法过于鲁莽，认为织血罗网不久后就会对她进行报复，然而……织血罗网的报复却始终未曾到来。在黑暗之中，宿老绮贝菈将帝皇的塔罗牌摊开，一张又一张地解读着帝皇的预兆，但结果却令她非常烦恼，因为她根本看不到任何暗示，完全没有理由消灭那位厚颜无耻的对手。因此，绮贝菈的利刃始终未曾出鞘。

languages.text: Mit ihrer neu gewonnenen Macht unternahm Jae Heydari große Anstrengungen, um dem Kult des Blutgesponnenen Netzes das Handwerk zu legen. Die Leichtigkeit, mit der sie Assassinen auf die Spinner hetzte und Propaganda verbreitete, verschleierte ihr starkes Eigeninteresse. Viele hielten ihr Tun für leichtfertig und rechneten mit einem baldigen Vergeltungsschlag ... der allerdings nie erfolgte. Mit den in der Dunkelheit ausgebreiteten Karten des Tarots des Imperators führte Wesir Kibellah eine Lesung nach der anderen durch, aber so sehr sie es auch beunruhigte, fand sie keinen Befehl, dem Leben ihrer Rivalin ein Ende zu setzen. Und so blieb die Klinge in ihrer Scheide.
languages.original_text: With her newly acquired power and resources, Jae Heydari expended a great deal of effort to put an end to the Cult of the Bloodspun Web. The ease with which she sent assassins after the spinners and spread damning propaganda betrayed her strong vested interest. Many thought her actions reckless and expected a retaliatory strike to be delivered before long, but... it never came. With the cards of the Emperor's Tarot spread before her in the darkness, Vizsier Kibellah performed one reading after another, but, as much as it troubled her, she could find no command to end the life of her brazen adversary. Thus, the blade remained sheathed.

Und so blieb die Klinge in ihrer Scheide.

languages.text: Forte de son nouveau pouvoir et des ressources dont elle disposait désormais, Jae Heydari employa les grands moyens pour éradiquer le culte de la Toile de Sang. L'ardeur qu'elle mit à envoyer des assassins aux trousses des tisseurs et à diffuser une propagande accablante à leur encontre trahissait des intérêts personnels non négligeables. Nombreux étaient ceux qui considéraient ses agissements comme pure folie et qui s'attendaient à ce qu'elle fasse rapidement l'objet de représailles sanglantes, mais en fin de compte, rien de tel ne se produisit. Les arcanes du tarot de l'Empereur étalés sous ses yeux dans les ténèbres, la vizir Kibellah eut beau multiplier les tirages et interprétations successifs, à son grand dam, jamais elle n'y vit l'ordre de mettre un terme à l'existence de sa rivale, raison pour laquelle sa lame demeura au fourreau.
languages.original_text: With her newly acquired power and resources, Jae Heydari expended a great deal of effort to put an end to the Cult of the Bloodspun Web. The ease with which she sent assassins after the spinners and spread damning propaganda betrayed her strong vested interest. Many thought her actions reckless and expected a retaliatory strike to be delivered before long, but... it never came. With the cards of the Emperor's Tarot spread before her in the darkness, Vizsier Kibellah performed one reading after another, but, as much as it troubled her, she could find no command to end the life of her brazen adversary. Thus, the blade remained sheathed.

traits.locale_text: Forte de son nouveau pouvoir et des ressources dont elle disposait désormais, Jae Heydari employa les grands moyens pour éradiquer le culte de la Toile de Sang. L'ardeur qu'elle mit à envoyer des assassins aux trousses des tisseurs et à diffuser une propagande accablante à leur encontre trahissait des intérêts personnels non négligeables. Nombreux étaient ceux qui considéraient ses agissements comme pure folie et qui s'attendaient à ce qu'elle fasse rapidement l'objet de représailles sanglantes, mais en fin de compte, rien de tel ne se produisit. languages.text: Jae Heydari, yeni edindiği güç ve kaynaklarla Kanipi Ağı Tarikatı'nın kökünü kazıma girişimlerini büyük çapta genişletti. Dokurların peşinden suikastçılar göndermekte gösterdiği rahatlık ve karalayıcı propagandalar yayması, kuvvetle tutunduğu menfaatleriyle ters düştü. Niceleri, eylemlerinin pervasızca olduğunu düşündü ve çok vakit geçmeden misilleme yapılmasını bekledi ancak... O vakit hiç gelmedi. İmparator'un Tarotu'nun kartlarını karanlıkta boylu boyunca açan Vezir Kibellah, ardı ardına okumalar gerçekleştirdi. Ancak her ne kadar canını sıksa da küstah rakibinin canını almaya dair tek bir emir göremedi. Bundandır ki kılıcı kınından hiç çıkmadı.
languages.original_text: With her newly acquired power and resources, Jae Heydari expended a great deal of effort to put an end to the Cult of the Bloodspun Web. The ease with which she sent assassins after the spinners and spread damning propaganda betrayed her strong vested interest. Many thought her actions reckless and expected a retaliatory strike to be delivered before long, but... it never came. With the cards of the Emperor's Tarot spread before her in the darkness, Vizsier Kibellah performed one reading after another, but, as much as it troubled her, she could find no command to end the life of her brazen adversary. Thus, the blade remained sheathed.
